FuncDef: This command creates a multi-stream S-PMSI policy. Having multiple multi-stream S-PMSIs per MVPN creates a link list, in which the first match (lowest index) will be chosen for a multicast stream. The number of configured multi-stream S-PMSIs cannot exceed the configured maximum S-PMSI for a given MVPN.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the index number. Values-1 to 1024.
